title: Sarjakusettaja
overview: The charming Jimi turns out to be the most destructive match of Roza's life. What starts as a seemingly perfect relationship on Tinder quickly unravels. Soon, it becomes clear that Jimi isn't interested in love—only money. Roza falls victim to an exceptionally ruthless identity fraud scheme, with Jimi accumulating massive debt in her name. The series is based on true events and includes dramatized scenes. Jimi is portrayed throughout the series by Mikko Kuokka.
